items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, high quality midi dress
items.body: I love this dress!! I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the fabric; it's soft, thick, and has some stretch! I wasn't sure how long it would be, but I'm 5'6" and it fell just below my knees. I ordered a small and, other than a little extra room in the waist, it fits well! The A-line shape is beautiful and the skirt twirls very nicely. I will definitely be buying more in other colors! Read more
items.author: Lizzy Williamson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars soo beautiful!
items.body: Love the color! It feels thicker and heavier that I love it. Its warmth and smooth to put it on. It will go with everything shoes I have it. Size is great fit Read more
items.author: Jessie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, fast delivery
items.body: I loved the style, the fit through the bodice and the feel of this dress. I have long legs so the length was too short and not the tea length I needed. I am 5'6" 130 lbs so the small was a perfect fit in the bodice area and if I ordered a medium it would have given me an extra inch in length but I did not want to compromise a looser fit in the bodice. Other then that I would definitely recommend this dress. Furthermore, it arrived very quickly and I am assuming the return will be just as well. Very pleased with this company and am looking again to order a different style from them. Great Quality! Read more
items.author: Moose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Definitely impressed with quality! What a beautiful color and material! Simply loved it! Fits great to size and is so classy! Read more
items.author: Robert-Isaac Rueda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased Black and love it!
items.body: Purchased the dress for winter festivities. Thicker fabric provides warmth but not bulk. Dress fits nicely and really is that perfect black dress for winter. Add a jacket or sweater, belt, gloves, boots or heels. Dress it up or down. Read more
items.author: Consumer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall dress
items.body: Perfect fit for size, made well, nice hefty fabric, not thin. Good length, I’m 5’. 5”, it hit mid calf. Great color brown, will buy this again. Easily to dress it up or wear casual. Read more
items.author: thaby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality
items.body: Great fit! Wonderful thickness on the material. Not made cheap. It’s high quality. Read more
items.author: Marion Kusajtys

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars That is not no way worth the money
items.body: This is something that I would not recommend for anyone to buy. It’s a piece of trash. Read more
items.author: Diathy Peterson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Light Blue, Dark Cyan, Pink, White, Beige, Dark Blue, Grey Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
